Summary: the object was more v-shaped than triangle and traveled north toward St. Louis the shape distorted the stars around it, no lights were visible.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt happened when I went on break at the hospital where I work, I was coming back from break and was walking back to the hospital from my car and I glanced up at the sky, something was different so I scanned the sky more carefully and there was a v-shaped object flying south to north over the hospital, no lights but the object was huge, it moved slowly and you could see the surrounding stars but it was like looking at them under water-or a better description is putting a glass in water and peering at objects in the water through the glass. anyway the object was moving slowly and it made absolutely no sound at all. I watched it for approximately 5 min until the hospital blocked my view.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Farmington
There were no other sightings in Farmington on or around March 13th 2011
